Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 1st overall pick, by Toronto in 2006...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/3/2007, off Jon Garland (TB)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/3/2007, off Jon Garland (TB)...
Drove in 6 runs against Boston on 7/31/2007...
Traded from Toronto to Chicago (N) on 2/4/2009 (Going to TOR: P R. Madson. Going to CHN: 3B E. Longoria, P T. Stauffer)...
Had 5 hits with 5 RBI against Milwaukee on 5/14/2009...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/1/2009, hitting .545 with 2 HR, 4 RBI...
Injured on 7/26/2009 with a Tender Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 5/10/2011 with a Hyper Extended Knee, out for one week...
Hit for the cycle against Cincinnati on 7/12/2011...
Drove in 6 runs against Colorado on 9/3/2012...
Hit 3 homeruns against Philadelphia, driving in 6 runs on 10/4/2012...
Was selected to the 2013 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/14/2014, hitting .438 with 3 HR, 10 RBI...
Hit 3 homeruns against Atlanta, driving in 5 runs on 8/16/2014...
Traded from Chicago (N) to Philadelphia on 4/30/2015 (Going to PHI: 3B E. Longoria. Going to CHN: 3B K. Youkilis, P P. Carter Jr., C D. Geis, C R. Claar)...
Drove in 6 runs against Florida on 9/15/2015...
Won Batter of the Month award on 10/1/2015, hitting .327 with 11 HR, 34 RBI...
Won World Championship with Philadelphia in 2015...
Drove in 6 runs against New York (N) on 7/8/2016...
Was selected to the 2016 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against Houston on 8/31/2016...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/3/2016, hitting .440 with 5 HR, 9 RBI...
Sets a new season NL-Record for HR with 62 on 9/7/2016...
Injured on 6/17/2017 with a Pulled Groin Muscle, out for 5-6 weeks...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against St. Louis on 9/10/2017...
Drove in 7 runs against St. Louis on 8/3/2018...
Won Player of the Week award on 10/1/2018, hitting .333 with 5 HR, 12 RBI...
Won World Championship with Philadelphia in 2018...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/27/2019, hitting .455 with 5 HR, 18 RBI...
Was selected to the 2019 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against Washington on 7/10/2020...
Was selected to the 2020 Allstar game...
Had 500th career homerun on 7/21/2020, off Mark Parker (CHA)...
Won Batter of the Month award on 8/1/2020, hitting .313 with 14 HR, 39 RBI...
Signed as a free agent by Colorado on 2/21/2022 to a 3-year deal worth $8,500,000 per year...
Had 2000th career hit on 8/22/2022, off Aroldis Chapman (MIL)...
Injured on 4/30/2023 with a Blurred Vision Eye, out for 2-3 weeks...
Had 600th career homerun on 6/17/2023, off Jeremy Hellickson (MIL)...
